migrationFix.intro:
Lastest Twitchat update failed properly migrating some of your triggers, losing configurations.

Let's attempt to fix that.
migrationFix.info: Until then, the " @:triggers.actions.common.action_http " trigger action allowed to extract JSON data from the data received. Now, that JSON extraction is done with a new dedicated " @:triggers.actions.common.action_json_extract " trigger action. That conversion seem to have failed for {COUNT} of your trigger actions.
migrationFix.change1: The {TRIGGER_ACTION} action of your trigger {TRIGGER_NAME} will be updated as bellow:
migrationFix.change2: The following action will be added right after the {TRIGGER_ACTION} action to extract the data as it should:
migrationFix.end:
You can now close this window.

If you rejected some fixes that you want to review, restart Twitchat without clicking on " @:migrationFix.close ".
